topics.body:
Was with friends at a book store.

My friend Danny was looking for a manga.
The manga section is extremely exposed. Everyone can see you browsing it.
And a lot of the mangas are pornographic so it's even worse.

The Yu-Gi-Oh mangas were all sliced open for the card.

It's anarchy
